Title: Requires automobiles sold in this state with model year 2025 and thereafter to be equipped with a blind spot monitoring device
Summary: Requires automobiles sold in this state with model year 2025 and thereafter to be equipped with a blind spot monitoring device.
LawCode: Add ยง379, V & T L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the vehicle and traffic law, in relation to requiring all new motor vehicles sold in this state to be equipped with a blind spot monitoring device
